page.title: 11QUERNMORE SPORTS 2
page.content: Quernmore School organises races for all the children in the school and parish. You can have pony rides or play on the inflatable castle and there's always a queue for the swingboats. Mothers take their babies to the marquee for the Baby Show while older children are spending their prize money on ice cream and crisps. Later on in the afternoon there is a Punch and Judy show for the younger children. Quernmore school girls enjoy a skittleball match and the boys a game of football. Sandwiches and hot dogs are on sale and the young people get ready for one of their favourite sports, pillow fighting. The ones who have any energy left enter for the Field races.
